revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Resolution Cave |image = [[File:Resolution Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Resolution Cave. |tokens = 1,250,000 |location = West of Poni Meadow / South of Poni Gauntlet }}
'''Resolution Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 17,114,462 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Veteran (female).png|40px]] Veteran Leticia || [[File:Ribombee.png|40px]] Ribombee, [[File:Bewear.png|40px]] Bewear |- | [[File:Alolan Dugtrio.png|40px]] Alolan Dugtrio || [[File:Backpacker (female).png|40px]] Backpacker Maria || [[File:Manectric.png|40px]] Manectric |- | [[File:Druddigon.png|40px]] Druddigon || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Travis || [[File:Alolan Dugtrio.png|40px]] Alolan Dugtrio, [[File:Mudsdale.png|40px]] Mudsdale |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !!
